entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 13 except 7 along the Strait. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 13 except 7 along the Strait. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers late this evening and after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Becoming clear before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
